channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Best Apple Watch apps for boosting your productivity
item.description: Although the Apple Watch comes with simple built-in productivity apps like Reminders and Calendar, it’s worth exploring some third-party apps that are designed to boost productivity by offering additional functionality.

item.title: India startup funding hits $11B in 2025 as investors grow more selective
item.description: Startup funding rounds in India fell sharply in 2025 as investors concentrated capital into fewer companies.
